Title: HTML
SubTitle: Basic web foundation
Description: "Master HTML 5 - semantic tags, geolocation, audio, video, more."

Title: CSS
SubTitle: Basic web foundation
Description: "Master CSS 3 - flexbox, flexgrid, variables and more."

Title: JavaScript
SubTitle: Basic web foundation
Description: Master JavaScript - the language of the web. Lowest barrier to entry of any programming language. Any browser and the ability to edit and save text files.

Title: Node.js
SubTitle: JavaScript for the backend
Description: "If you know JavaScript for the front-end, why not build a backend as well. Node.js is browserless JavaScript. You'll have to install it. "

Title: Deno.js
SubTitle: JavaScript for the backend
Description: Deno is the updated version of Node.js - by the creator of Node.

Title: Responsive Design
SubTitle: Auto adjust to any screen size
Description: "Design for mobile first, and then automatically flow for larger screens. "

Title: CSS:Bootstrap
SubTitle: Auto adjust to any screen size
Description: Widely used set of classes and behaviors for responsive design.

Title: CSS:Pure
SubTitle: Yahoo's simple CSS solution
Description: "Very small CSS library. No build tools required, easy to get started with a nice layout. "

Title: CSS:Flexbox
SubTitle: Flexible 1D CSS layout model
Description: Important built-in CSS layout mode for arranging things in a container in one dimension.

Title: CSS:Grid
SubTitle: Flexible 2D CSS layout model
Description: Important built-in CSS layout mode for arranging things in a container in two dimensions: rows and columns.

Title: Web Components
SubTitle: Reuse custom elements
Description: Reuse parts of a web page with no build tool and no framework. It's really easy.

Title: Git
SubTitle: Distributed version control
Description: Master this widely-used system for managing evolving project files.

Title: GitHub
SubTitle: Free hosting for code projects
Description: Master this popular place to store and share code for free.

Title: Bitbucket
SubTitle: Free hosting for code projects
Description: Another popular place to store and share code for free.

Title: PowerShell
SubTitle: Cross-platform shell
Description: "Master this popular, multiplatform shell for running commands without a GUI. "

Title: Bash
SubTitle: Linux shell
Description: "Know this poplar Linux-based shell. On Windows, Git Bash is a great place to start, then add Windows Subsystem for Linux. "

Title: Win: Chocolatey
SubTitle: Windows package manager
Description: Established Windows Package Manager - lots of packages ready to go.

Title: Win: TortoiseGit
SubTitle: Super easy Git integration on Windows
Description: Integrates Git into the Windows File Explorer. Makes 90% of daily activities super easy - do the rest in Git Bash.

Title: Win: Scoop
SubTitle: Windows package manager
Description: Newer Windows Package Manager - lots of packages getting added.

Title: Win: WinGet
SubTitle: Built-in Windows package manager
Description: Built-in Windows Package Manager - a bit more complicated syntax than choco or scoop.

Title: HTTP
SubTitle: Calling functions on the web
Description: Understand HTTP - this is a key protocol for communicating on the web.

Title: HTTPS
SubTitle: Secure HTTP
Description: Encrypted HTTP for exchanging data more securely

Title: HTTP Resource
SubTitle: The data accessible via an HTTP request
Description: Understand web resources - the content we interact with via endpoints.

Title: HTTP Route
SubTitle: Just the path (doesn't include the verb)
Description: "Understand how endpoints are defined by a route, or path and an HTTP verb."

Title: HTTP Verbs (Methods)
SubTitle: "GET, PUT, POST, DELETE"
Description: "Understand how endpoints are defined by a route, or path and an HTTP verb."

Title: HTTP Endpoint
SubTitle: Route + Verb
Description: Example GET + /api/v2/companies/5/employees/3

Title: HTTP Request
SubTitle: Well-defined client request
Description: What a client uses to make a RESTful request.

Title: HTTP Response
SubTitle: Well-defined server response
Description: What a server uses to reply to a RESTful request.

Title: API Definition - Tables
SubTitle: API Summary table
Description: Summarize your API (less detail than Swagger)

Title: API Definition - Detailed
SubTitle: API Details - autogenerated by tools.
Description: See the example from Swagger. Autogenerated from API spec.

Title: Serverless
SubTitle: Just an endpoint. Functions as a service.
Description: "Instead of a monolithic app, break it into microservices."

SubTitle: "Easy, free hosting for all major langugaes. "
Description: "Platform as a service - easy to learn deployment, devops, regardless of language."

Title: Deploy: Begin.com
SubTitle: "Easy, free hosting for Node and Deno apps. "

Title: Deploy: AWS Lambda
SubTitle: Deploy a function.
Description: Popular way to create apps for Alexa and more.

SubTitle: My new favorite language

SubTitle: A joy to work with

SubTitle: Scripting for big data and the web

SubTitle: Powerful server-side

SubTitle: Famous for READMEs and Jupyter.

SubTitle: Programming & reporting together

SubTitle: New methodology

SubTitle: Understand CI and CD
Description: Understand these terms and the popular tools associated with them.

Title: Big Data: Apache Beam
SubTitle: Big data integrated platform
Description: Unified programming model for big data and distributed data processing. When one computer isn't enough.

Title: Big Data: Apache Spark
SubTitle: Big data distributed processing system
Description: "Single code base for batch and stream in memory (fast!) processing with Python, SQL, Scala, Java, R."

Title: Big Data: Flink
SubTitle: Big data distributed processing system
Description: Pure streaming approach to batch and stream in memory (fast!) processing with Java and Scala.

Title: Big Data: Sources
SubTitle: Raw data coming in
Description: "Explore public datasets, see also Kaggle,  and data.gov."

Title: Big Data: Sinks
SubTitle: Information output
Description: "From sources, through processing with transforms, and finally writing into sinks for exploration. "

Title: Big Data Processing
SubTitle: Batch and streaming
Description: "Element processing, e.g., ParDo, map, flatmap and by-key (and by-window) aggregation, e.g, group by key, combine, reduce."

Title: Big Data: Apache Kafka
SubTitle: Messaging system
Description: High performance message streaming.

SubTitle: Write pipelines with Java
Description: Write pipelines using the Java SDK.

Title: Beam pipelines in Python
SubTitle: Write pipelines with Python
Description: Write pipelines using the Python SDK.

Title: Beam pipelines in Go
SubTitle: Write pipelines with Go
Description: Write pipelines using the Go SDK. Do this one last. :)

SubTitle: "CircleCI, TravisCI, GitHub Actions"

Title: CD: Continous Delivery
SubTitle: Delivery or deployment?
Description: Release quality products frequently and predictably.

Title: CD: Continous Deployment
SubTitle: Delivery or deployment?
Description: Software release process that uses automated testing to validate software. Be careful when making updates automatically go live.

SubTitle: Understand enviroments
Description: Set up project flow with a series of environments and automation.

SubTitle: Major.Minor.Patch

SubTitle: Try Jupyter in CoLab
Description: Try the tutorials and existing notebooks to get started.

Title: GUID
SubTitle: Unique ID 128 bit string
Description: """CONCATENATE(DEC2HEX(RANDBETWEEN(0,4294967295),8),""-"",DEC2HEX(RANDBETWEEN(0,42949),4),""-"",DEC2HEX(RANDBETWEEN(0,42949),4),""-"",DEC2HEX(RANDBETWEEN(0,42949),4),""-"",DEC2HEX(RANDBETWEEN(0,4294967295),8),DEC2HEX(RANDBETWEEN(0,42949),4))"""
